metadata.title: Sept 2021 | Dagster Community Meeting
metadata.excerpt: The Dagster community meets every 2 months on the second Tuesday at 9 AM PST. At each meetup, the Dagster team will provide product updates and, depending on interest, community members will give lightning talks or demos. Click to register and be added to the calendar invite.

metadata.title: July 2021 | Dagster Community Meeting
metadata.excerpt: In our eighth Dagster Community Meeting, Carlson Cheng from Thinking Machine showed off how their data consultancy firm uses Dagster for machine learning workflows, and the core team presented changes and improvements in the recent Dagster 0.12.0 release.

metadata.title: May 2021 | Dagster Community Meeting
metadata.excerpt: In our seventh Dagster Community Meeting, Simon SpÃ¤ti from Rohde & Schwarz MNT discussed the production Dagster setup at R&S, and the core team presented our recent API "approachability" improvements, as well as upcoming 0.12.0 features.

metadata.title: March 2021 | Dagster Community Meeting
metadata.excerpt: In our sixth Dagster Community Meeting, the core team presented upcoming 0.11.0 features, including Dynamic Orchestration, a system to establish Asset Lineage, and a new documentation site.

metadata.title: Feb 2021 | Dagster Community Meeting
metadata.excerpt: In our fifth Dagster Community Meeting, Dennis Hume from Drizly and Noah Kantrowitz from Geomagical Labs discussed about their production Dagster setups.

metadata.title: 0.10.0 "The Edge of Glory" Release
metadata.excerpt: In our fourth Dagster Community Meeting, we showcased some ðŸ”¥ features in the upcoming 0.10.0 release.

metadata.title: Nov 2020 | Dagster Community Meeting
metadata.excerpt: At the November Community Meeting, Tobias Macy talked about running Dagster in Production at MIT Open Learning, Dmitry Matasov showcased building a platform for data analysts using Dagster, and Daniel Gibson from the Dagster team presented new features coming out in Dagster 0.10.0.

metadata.title: 0.9.0 "Laundry Service" Release
metadata.excerpt: This is the September 2020 community meeting where the Dagster team announced Dagster 0.9.0.

metadata.title: 0.8.0 "In the Zone" Release
metadata.excerpt: This is a kickoff meeting for the Dagster community  where the Dagster team announced Dagster 0.8.0.

metadata.title: Digging Into Dagster: An Opinionated Open Source Framework For Data Orchestration
metadata.excerpt: Digging Into Dagster: An Opinionated Open Source Framework For Data Orchestration

metadata.title: Dagster with Nick Schrock at Software Engineering Daily
metadata.excerpt: Dagster with Nick Schrock: Discussion on modern data engineering and why it continues to be so difficult for engineers to be productive with their data

metadata.title: Build Maintainable And Testable Data Applications With Dagster at Data Engineering Podcast
metadata.excerpt: In this episode Nick Schrock, the founder of Elementl, explains his motivation for creating a product for data management, how the programming model simplifies the work of building testable and maintainable pipelines, and his vision for the future of data programming.

metadata.title: Orchestrating dbt with Dagster at Coalesce 2020
metadata.excerpt: Orchestrating dbt with Dagster: how to place dbt in context, de-silo your operational systems, improve monitoring, and enable self-service operations.

metadata.title: When metadata becomes data at Coalesce 2020
metadata.excerpt: David Wallace, the data platform engineer at Good Eggs, shares some light on the different approaches to metadata management.

metadata.title: Analytics on your analytics, Drizly at Coalesce 2020
metadata.excerpt: Emily, the data infrastructure lead at Drizly, covers how Dagster adds testing functionality for a dbt run and allows analysts to run specific models on production.

metadata.title: Dagster: Workflows for Data Science, Machine Learning, and Data Engineering at Data Council 2020
metadata.excerpt: This talk describes how Dagster can enable a unified stack of tooling across a wide dynamic range of use cases: from a laptop to a Kubernetes cluster; from local development, to monitoring in production; from data science, to data engineering, to machine learning.

metadata.title: Build Data Application with Dagster at Line Developer Day 2019
metadata.excerpt: Weera Kasetsin, the data science lead at LINE Company (Thailand), talks about how LINE builds modern data application with the Dagster features of multiple output, pipeline modes and type-checking.

metadata.title: Dagster: A Framework for Data Processing Applications
metadata.excerpt: Scale By The Bay 2019

metadata.title: Dagster: An open source Python library for building data applications at Crunch
metadata.excerpt: We introduce Dagster, an open source Python library for building ETL processes, ML pipelines, and similar software systems, all of which we call data applications.

metadata.title: Dagster: A New Programming Model for Data Processing
metadata.excerpt: This talk introduced Dagster, an open source framework for building and modeling data processing computations.
